ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bottom half of song (minor spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I m actually wondering this myself... if i can just kite off his little gang then hand him the note and maybe kite off the dopple (or does he summon?)  I heard
ygData.messageBody:
I'm actually wondering this myself... if i can just kite off his little gang
then hand him the note and maybe kite off the dopple (or does he summon?) I
heard turning into a DE makes the quest npc non aggro

I wanna do this part of the quest soon too... and hoping to haul around the
least ammount of people possible as to not waste everyone's time

Minkin
49 bard

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: February 22, 2001 10:36 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bottom half of song (minor spoiler)


I am finsihing up the easy part of the Bard Epic, and ran into a problem. I
went to find the guy in W Karana who turns into a Doppelganger (Miraz or
something). I found his little band of merry men, and as I approached, they
agroed on me.

Do I have to charm him to give him the note?

DO I have to kill off all his lackey's first?

In any case, do oyu think a group (6) of 50-54 will have any problem taking
them out?

Elfson Allegro 51(doh, raided again last night so still haven't pushed out
that last smidge to 52) Veeshan

PS. I don't know whY i am bothering to do this since I don't think I will
ever be able to finish the quest since I depend on other guilds to take me
on dragon raids, thus I will never get the components... Guess I can say I
am half done my Epic Quest :-)
